sentences.en: He felt a sudden sense of calm, of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他突然感到一种安宁和满足.

sentences.en: He felt the press of modern life.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到现代生活的压力。

sentences.en: I felt a sharp pain in my lower back.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到后腰一阵剧痛。

sentences.en: I felt incredibly ashamed of myself for getting so angry.
sentences.cn: 我对自己发那么大的火而深感惭愧。

sentences.en: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.cn: 我觉得每天都在遭受失望的打击。

sentences.en: I felt lonesome in the strange land.
sentences.cn: 在那陌生的地方我觉得寂寞。

sentences.en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentences.cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentences.en: I felt that might well mend the rift between them.
sentences.cn: 我觉得那样做也许可以让他们冰释前嫌。

sentences.en: In the circumstances he felt he'd been very restrained.
sentences.cn: 在那种情况下，他觉得自己一直非常冷静。

sentences.en: It felt like the loneliest place in the world.
sentences.cn: 感觉这就像是天底下最荒凉的地方。

sentences.en: She felt a little more reconciled to her lot.
sentences.cn: 她感到对自己的命运多少接受一些了。

sentences.en: She felt colour flame up in her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她感到脸上火辣辣地红了起来。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: The officials felt taken for granted and grumbled loudly.
sentences.cn: 这些官员感到受了怠慢，于是大声抱怨起来。

sentences.en: The shock waves yesterday were felt from Las Vegas to San Diego.
sentences.cn: 昨天从拉斯维加斯到圣迭戈都感觉到了这几股冲击波。

sentences.en: Those tensions have been felt most acutely by women.
sentences.cn: 最能深切感受到这种紧张氛围的是女性。

sentences.en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: We felt we were living life on several different planes.
sentences.cn: 我们感到大家生活的精神层次各不相同。

words.tran_cn: 有感觉的；有同情心的；富于感情的
感动地，充满感情地；衷心地
感觉，触觉；感情，情绪；同情
感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸

trans.tran_en: a thick soft material made of wool, hair, or fur that has been pressed flat

trans.tran_cn: 摸索( feel的过去式和过去分词 )，触，深感，以为
trans.tran_en: to make into or cover with felt
